response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. After careful consideration, we propose to offer this product to you for $1,200,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, but we hope this offer reflects a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
